name: Gilt & Good Graces
description:
When you receive a mysterious inheritance, you suddenly find yourself catapulted into the social elite. Navigate the intrigue, discover the origin of your newfound wealth, and craft relationships with your peers among high society.

Created during the 4th and 6th semesters of Videogames BA degree (2019).

This is a demo with some content cut.

Credits:
Eva Vital - writing, art, programming, design
